text: Hercules is a constellation in the northern part of the sky. It represents the mythological Hercules of Greek mythology. It was one of the 48 constellations listed by an astronomer known as Ptolemy around the year 150 CE. It is now one of the 88 modern constellations on the International Astronomical Union's list. ==References== Category:Constellations Category:Constellations listed by Ptolemy
title: Hercules (constellation)
